data.lyric:
[ti:chaotic]
[ar:Tate McRae]
[al:chaotic]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.18]chaotic - Tate McRae
[00:01.55]Lyrics by：Tate McRae/Greg Kurstin/Victoria Zaro
[00:02.69]Composed by：Tate McRae/Greg Kurstin/Victoria Zaro
[00:04.26]
[00:08.41]I have this paralyzing fear that I'll maybe go nowhere
[00:12.14]
[00:12.79]But god forbid me ever admitting I could be scared
[00:16.41]
[00:17.30]And I can't stand my friends right now we got nothing in common
[00:21.03]
[00:21.73]But being lonely's worse than just having friends that don't care
[00:25.41]
[00:26.21]You said it looks like I've been going through hell
[00:31.92]How did you know
[00:33.17]
[00:34.11]How could you tell
[00:35.51]
[00:36.04]Ask me to explain myself well
[00:42.48]
[00:43.88]I'm trying my best here to be brutally honest
[00:48.04]Nobody said changing would be this exhausting
[00:52.81]A foot on the break 'cause it's been making me carsick
[00:57.11]How could you blame me
[00:59.26]Growing up is chaotic
[01:01.36]
[01:02.34]Don't wanna say it but I really think that I miss him
[01:05.87]
[01:06.61]It might seem stupid but I still look through all our texts
[01:10.23]
[01:11.04]Who knew they wanting someonе could ever make mе this desperate
[01:14.61]
[01:15.33]Don't think that I'll do that again
[01:16.97]
[01:19.93]You said it looks like I've been going through hell
[01:25.76]How did you know
[01:26.94]
[01:27.83]How could you tell
[01:29.66]You ask me to explain myself well
[01:36.22]
[01:37.49]I'm trying my best here to be brutally honest
[01:42.04]Nobody said changing would be this exhausting
[01:46.68]A foot on the break 'cause it's been making me carsick
[01:50.97]How could you blame me
[01:53.08]Growing up is chaotic
[01:55.20]
[01:56.75]And maybe I'm just blowing all this s**t up in my head
[02:01.58]But I can't help it
[02:03.76]No I can't help it
[02:05.79]Fooling myself thinking that I'll never love again
[02:10.51]'Cause d**n I felt it
[02:12.75]I really felt it
[02:14.74]Maybe I'm just blowing all this s**t up in my head
[02:18.96]
[02:19.48]But I can't help it
[02:21.74]No I can't help it
[02:23.83]Spending too much times on things I know that I'll forget
[02:28.36]But d**n I felt it
[02:31.44]I'm tryin' my best here to be brutally honest
[02:35.70]Nobody said changin' could be this exhaustin'
[02:39.88]
[02:40.47]A foot on the break 'cause it's making me carsick
[02:44.39]
[02:44.98]How could you blame me
data.trans:
[ti:chaotic]
[ar:Tate McRae]
[al:chaotic]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.18]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.55]//
[00:02.69]//
[00:04.26]
[00:08.41]我这样六神无主 不知道可能会去往哪里
[00:12.14]
[00:12.79]但是上帝禁止我承认自己可能会害怕
[00:16.41]
[00:17.30]我现在忍受不了我那些朋友 我们没有任何共同点
[00:21.03]
[00:21.73]但是孤独比拥有漠不关心的朋友感觉更可怕
[00:25.41]
[00:26.21]你说我就好像去地狱走了一遭
[00:31.92]你是从何知晓的
[00:33.17]
[00:34.11]你是怎么看出来的
[00:35.51]
[00:36.04]你要我说明一下自己 好吧
[00:42.48]
[00:43.88]我现在尽了最大的努力让自己完全坦诚
[00:48.04]没有人说过改变会这样耗费精力
[00:52.81]放下一只脚休息 因为这感觉就好像晕车
[00:57.11]你怎么能够怪我
[00:59.26]成长是混乱的
[01:01.36]
[01:02.34]不想承认 但我真的觉得自己很想他
[01:05.87]
[01:06.61]这可能有点愚蠢 但我依然在浏览我们那些信息
[01:10.23]
[01:11.04]谁知道对某个人的欲望能让我这样失望
[01:14.61]
[01:15.33]不要以为我会重蹈覆辙
[01:16.97]
[01:19.93]你说我就好像去地狱走了一遭
[01:25.76]你是从何知晓的
[01:26.94]
[01:27.83]你怎么看出来的
[01:29.66]你要我说明一下自己 好吧
[01:36.22]
[01:37.49]我现在尽了最大的努力让自己完全坦诚
[01:42.04]没有人说过改变会这样耗费精力
[01:46.68]放下一只脚休息 因为这感觉就好像晕车
[01:50.97]你怎么能够怪我
[01:53.08]成长是混乱的
[01:55.20]
[01:56.75]或许我只是想这一切想得脑子一团乱
[02:01.58]但我难以自控
[02:03.76]不 我难以自控
[02:05.79]自欺欺人 觉得我不会再坠入爱河
[02:10.51]因为我感觉到了
[02:12.75]我真的感觉到了
[02:14.74]或许我只是想这一切想得脑子一团乱
[02:18.96]
[02:19.48]但我难以自控
[02:21.74]不 我难以自控
[02:23.83]浪费了太多时间 在那些我明知道自己会遗忘的事情上
[02:28.36]但我感觉到了
[02:31.44]我现在尽了最大的努力让自己完全坦诚
[02:35.70]没有人说过改变会这样耗费精力
[02:39.88]
[02:40.47]放下一只脚休息 因为这感觉就好像晕车
[02:44.39]
[02:44.98]你怎么能够指责我
